abilities.name: Exemplar of Hate
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Feared Interrogator
abilities.rule: At the start of the Fight phase, each enemy **CHARACTER** unit within 6" of this model must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test when they do. In addition, each time this model destroys an enemy **CHARACTER** model with a melee attack, you gain 1CP.
